alert.note: Alert for Boone; Callaway; Cole; Moniteau (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 3:22AM CDT until June 08 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cole County in central Missouri... Boone County in central Missouri... Western Callaway County in central Missouri... Moniteau County in central Missouri... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 322 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Boonville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rocheport around 330 AM CDT. Midway around 335 AM CDT. Easley around 340 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Columbia Regional Airport and Fulton. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 115 and 144. This also includes Rock Bridge State Park, Finger Lakes State Park, Jewell Cemetery Historic Site, and Jefferson Landing Historic Site. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
